subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ちから}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ちから}}. Compound of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ちから}} elements {{compound|ja|sort=ちから|霊|tr1=chi|t1=power, life force, essence|から|tr2=kara|t2=from}}.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|力%足|ちから% あし}}: a [[tense]]d [[leg]]; [[tensing]] one's [[leg]]s; {{qualifier|sumo}} the traditional [[sumo]] [[stomp]] at the beginning of a [[match]]
* {{ja-r|力%合わせ|ちから% あわせ}}: matching strength: a [[competition]] of [[strength]]; {{qualifier|by extension}} a [[sumo]] [[match]]
* {{ja-r|力%軍|ちから% いくさ}}: a [[test]] of [[strength]], a [[competition]] of [[strength]]
* {{ja-r|力%石|ちから% いし}}: a large [[stone]] used as a [[dumbbell]] for purposes of [[test]]s of [[strength]]
* {{ja-r|力%一杯|ちから% いっぱい}}: with all one's strength, as hard as one can
* {{ja-r|力%持ち|ちから%もち}}: a very [[strong]] [[person]]
* {{ja-r|力%添え|ちから%ぞえ}}: [[help]], [[assistance]], [[aid]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|りき}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=りき}} {{m|ltc|力|tr=lik}}. The [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading, so likely the initial borrowing. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''lik<sup>6</sup>''.

subSections.title: Affix
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|りき}}

# [[physical]] [[strength]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=りき|Buddhism}} [[capability]], especially [[mystical]] [[power]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=りき|Buddhism}} the [[suchness]] of [[ability]], one of the [[w:Ten suchnesses|Ten Suchnesses]] in Mahayana Buddhism
# short for {{m|ja|力者|tr=rikisha}}: a [[strong]] person
# {{lb|ja|sort=りき|archaic}} short for {{m|ja|車力|tr=shariki}}, {{m|ja|力車|tr=rikisha}}: a [[rickshaw]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=りき|archaic}} a [[rickshaw]] operator's [[wage]]s
